Lowell.Salter School: Salter School is a for-profit vocational school with locations in New Bedford, Massachusetts, Tewksbury, Massachusetts, Malden, Massachusetts and Fall River, Massachusetts, operated as a component of the Premier Education Group. Salter School grew from the Salter Secretarial School established in Massachusetts in 1937. As its academic and business reputation grew, the Salter School moved locations and removed "secretarial" from the title in 1981.
